item.title: [Starter Command] Need help here! more info Inside!
item.dc:creator: @patsquare patsquare
item.description:
@patsquare wrote:

[code] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 50000000);
sendMessage(“Bamm Starter Package”);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“Sorry.”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " Is a noob and is trying to get a extra starter!! :p");

        }
    }

[/code]

item.title: [Starter Command] Need help here! more info Inside!
item.dc:creator: @eijsvogel eijsvogel
item.description:
@eijsvogel wrote:

Well, I got my started command;

} else if(cmd[0].equals("money")) { p.teleportTo(3087, 3491, 0, 4, 0, 8939, 8941, 1678, 0, 1679, 0); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, 995, 50000000); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "Use youre 50M Start wisely!!");

Yet, you can use this command over and over again… How to make it, that you can only do this once?
